org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.find

Class ExpressionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.find.ExpressionFactory

  • final class ExpressionFactory
extends Object
    Factory class for registering and searching for expressions for use in the Find command.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Map<String,Class<? extends Expression>> expressionMap 
      private static ExpressionFactory INSTANCE 
      private static String REGISTER_EXPRESSION_METHOD 

    • Constructor Summary

      private ExpressionFactory()
      Private constructor to ensure singleton.

    • Method Detail

      • getExpressionFactory

        static ExpressionFactory getExpressionFactory()

      • registerExpression

        void registerExpression(Class<? extends Expression> expressionClass)
        Invokes "static void registerExpression(FindExpressionFactory)" on the given class. This method abstracts the contract between the factory and the expression class. Do not assume that directly invoking registerExpression on the given class will have the same effect.
        Parameters:
        expressionClass - class to allow an opportunity to register

      • addClass

        void addClass(Class<? extends Expression> expressionClass,
            String... names)
        throws IOException
        Register the given class as handling the given list of expression names.
        Parameters:
        expressionClass - the class implementing the expression names
        names - one or more command names that will invoke this class
        Throws:
        IOException - if the expression is not of an expected type

      • isExpression

        boolean isExpression(String expressionName)
        Determines whether the given expression name represents and actual expression.
        Parameters:
        expressionName - name of the expression
        Returns:
        true if expressionName represents an expression

      • getExpression

        Expression getExpression(String expressionName,
                       Configuration conf)
        Get an instance of the requested expression
        Parameters:
        expressionName - name of the command to lookup
        conf - the Hadoop configuration
        Returns:
        the Expression or null if the expression is unknown

      • createExpression

        Expression createExpression(Class<? extends Expression> expressionClass,
                          Configuration conf)
        Creates an instance of the requested Expression class.
        Parameters:
        expressionClass - Expression class to be instantiated
        conf - the Hadoop configuration
        Returns:
        a new instance of the requested Expression class

      • createExpression

        Expression createExpression(String expressionClassname,
                          Configuration conf)
        Creates an instance of the requested Expression class.
        Parameters:
        expressionClassname - name of the Expression class to be instantiated
        conf - the Hadoop configuration
        Returns:
        a new instance of the requested Expression class
